alert.note: Alert for Fisher; Haskell; Jones; Nolan; Shackelford; Taylor; Throckmorton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 29 at 9:50PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Haskell, Jones, northeastern Nolan, northwestern Shackelford, southeastern Fisher, northwestern Taylor and Throckmorton Counties through 1030 PM CDT... At 948 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of strong thunderstorms extending from near Millers Creek Reservoir to Lake Sweetwater. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts 45 to 50 mph and pea size to half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Haskell, Stamford, Anson, Throckmorton, Merkel, Tye, Hawley, Lueders, Trent, Irby, Noodle, Paint Creek, Avoca, Millers Creek Reservoir, Caps, Dyess Afb, View, Nugent and Coronados Camp. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 251 and 286. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for west central Texas.

area.areaDesc: Fisher; Haskell; Jones; Nolan; Shackelford; Taylor; Throckmorton
